title: The Ancient Egyptian
creator_credit: International Film Foundation, Julien Bryan and Leroy Leatherman
brief_description: The Egyptian, portrayed through the art he left behind, is shown as a practical, industrious, optimistic lover of life and the world around him. Summarizes Egypt’s primeval past, settlement in the Nile Valley, and history from 2700 BC to the Roman Conquest with an epilogue about the building of the Aswan Dam and the threat to the temple at Abu Simbel.
